def_cn: (与影片、运动队、流行乐队等相关的)附带商品，文化衍生品
def_en: Merchandising consists of goods such as toys and clothes that are linked with something such as a film, sports team, or pop group.

def_cn: 推销;商品拓销;销售规划
def_en: Merchandising is used to refer to the way shops and businesses organize the sale of their products, for example the way they are displayed and the prices that are chosen.
